video.title: Man v. Food Collection
video.synopsis: Host Adam Richman goes on a mouthwatering journey to find America's greatest pig-out spots and take on the country's most legendary eating challenges.

episodes.synopsis: Adam stares down a 72-ounce slab of beef at the Big Texan Steak Ranch and dines on a super-spicy "burger from hell" in the meat capital of the world.
episodes.title: Amarillo

episodes.synopsis: Adam chows down on a bacon-wrapped hot dog, a Mexican food platter and the O.M.G. burger: 12 beef patties and 12 slices of cheese in a single bun.
episodes.title: Tucson

episodes.synopsis: Adam downs huge hot dogs and steamed cheeseburgers, then steps up to a 10-pound stuffed pizza challenge at Randy's Wooster St. Pizza Shop.
episodes.title: Hartford, Connecticut

episodes.synopsis: At Chompie's, Adam eats challah roll sliders and onion strings, then visits Alice Cooperstown for a 2-foot hot dog stuffed inside a baguette.
episodes.title: Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: Adam gets a taste of the Caribbean in San Juan with a churrasco steak sandwich and a deep-friend pork chop, then takes on a giant steak challenge.
episodes.title: Puerto Rico

episodes.synopsis: On Long Island, New York, Adam samples a range of sweet and savory Italian delights and takes on the Davey Jones' Locker Challenge at a local grill.
episodes.title: Long Island

episodes.synopsis: Adam settles in for a New England favorite at the scenic Lobster Shack and takes on the meaty Manimal Challenge at Tradewinds Cafe.
episodes.title: Portland, Maine

episodes.synopsis: In Florida, Adam coaches pro wrestler Jerry "Nasty" Sags in a hot wings challenge, samples alligator ribs and sinks his teeth into a Cuban sandwich.
episodes.title: Tampa Bay

episodes.synopsis: Adam samples spicy fried chicken and some one-of-a-kind pancakes, then coaches country duo LoCash Cowboys through a 72-ounce steak challenge.
episodes.title: Nashville

episodes.synopsis: Adam devours a four-patty chili cheeseburger and a 22-ounce prime rib steak, and a local firefighter takes on the Incinerator Spicy Pizza Challenge.
episodes.title: Tulsa

episodes.synopsis: Adam rounds up three big eaters to take on an infamous dish at Grandma's K & I Diner: a burrito covered with fries that weighs in at a hefty 8 pounds.
episodes.title: Albuquerque

episodes.synopsis: Adam cheers on "Man v. Food Nation" recruit "Big" Joe Evans as he attempts to set a new record at Wintzell's Oyster House by eating 422 oysters.
episodes.title: Mobile

episodes.synopsis: In the Florida Keys, Adam coaches a brave eater through a conch fritter contest and downs a fried hogfish sandwich and key lime pie.
episodes.title: Florida Keys

episodes.synopsis: In Portsmouth, New Hampshire, Adam orders a Sklarmageddon omelet and coaches a local through a challenge featuring 15 sliders, fries and a shake.
episodes.title: Portsmouth

episodes.synopsis: Adam coaches a local through a timed ice cream challenge at the Comfy Cow and dines on black walnut French toast at a popular breakfast destination.
episodes.title: Louisville

episodes.synopsis: Adam tastes the Midwestern city's best meats, and brings in backup to help him down a massive burger plus fries and spicy hot wings.
episodes.title: Milwaukee

episodes.synopsis: Adam gets his kicks sampling steak and frozen custard on a trip down Route 66, then coaches a retired Navy officer through a taco challenge.
episodes.title: Route 66

episodes.synopsis: In New York, Adam heads uptown to check out some historic sites, then helps the Harlem Globetrotters slam-dunk a spicy challenge at Rack & Soul BBQ.
episodes.title: Harlem

episodes.synopsis: Adam hits hot spots along the Pacific Coast Highway, sampling seafood, tacos and more, then helps a teacher take on a tri-tip steak challenge.
episodes.title: Pacific Coast Highway

episodes.synopsis: Adam hits the road to find the country's best street carts. He ends his trip in Los Angeles, where he recruits a local to take on a 6-pound burrito.
episodes.title: Street Eats

episodes.synopsis: In Cincinnati, Adam enjoys a grilled cheese sandwich filled with meaty goetta and cheers on a Little League coach in a Reuben sandwich challenge.
episodes.title: Cincinnati

episodes.synopsis: In Rochester, New York, NASCAR driver Joey Logano has 30 minutes to devour a massive bacon cheeseburger topped with pulled pork plus a pound of fries.
episodes.title: NASCAR

episodes.synopsis: In this scenic Southern city, Adam samples peach-glazed barbecue chicken and recruits twin brothers for a supremely spicy pulled pork challenge.
episodes.title: Savannah

episodes.synopsis: Adam checks out a shrimp truck, eats some unique Hawaiian-style hot dogs and recruits a local mom to try her luck with a giant omelet.
episodes.title: Oahu

episodes.synopsis: Adam eats a towering cheeseburger at a local drive-in, tastes top-notch fried chicken and coaches a college student facing 25 pulled-pork sliders.
episodes.title: Charlotte
